articles.content: Friday the 13th: The Video Game was an unexpected hit when it launched in 2017, with Illfonic's asymmetric survival horror gauntlet captivating millions of players often in spite of, and sometimes because of, its janky, bug-riddled design. The barriers to pla… [+5413 chars]

articles.title: Final Fantasy VII Remake Producer Still Doesn't Know How Many Parts There'll Be - Push Square

articles.content: Much was made of how Final Fantasy VII Remake will be split into instalments when the news broke years ago, but the backlash everyone was expecting from the wider gaming community hasn't come to fruition. We haven't come across any big complaints that the fir… [+1355 chars]

articles.title: Popular Google Doodle games return to keep people entertained in lockdown – and more are still to come - The Independent
articles.description: Company hopes games give people something to do while stuck at home
articles.content:
Google is bringing back its most popular Doodle games to keep people entertained through coronavirus lockdowns.
The new Doodles will highlight some of the best games to grace its homepage from recent years.
